health_tech: HIPAA compliant services for data handling

evidence.claim: The company outlines their HIPAA compliance for handling sensitive health information on their security page.
They discuss integration patterns for connecting health tech applications on their documentation page.
Their website mentions using APIs for interoperability with EHR systems.
Aging2 emphasizes secure data exchange compliant with X12 standards relevant for healthcare transactions.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on aging solutions, not primarily transaction processing.
